name: CPU

name: Motherboard
description: A motherboard is a printed circuit board or a PCB that creates the skeletal structure of a PC. It hosts components such as the Processor or CPU.

name: Mouse
description: A computer mouse (plural mice, sometimes mouses) is a hand-held pointing device that detects two-dimensional motion relative to a surface

name: Ram
